<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Striding Fire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=657)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

An embodiment of the speed and chaos of a spreading blaze, a striding fire appears as a lithe and long-limbed humanoid composed of shifting-hued flames churning within a skeleton-like framework.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Striding Fire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=657)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision

**Languages**
[Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The striding fire ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 bludgeoning plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Burning Rush** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The striding fire Strides up to double its Speed in a straight line. Its movement during this Stride doesn't trigger reactions. Any creature the striding fire was adjacent to at any point during this Stride must attempt a DC 24 basic Reflex save. If it critically fails, it is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) by a wave of heated air. The striding fire can't use Burning Rush for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-43" />
name: Striding Fire
